docs.text: continuous-documentation-delivery ¶ Learning Objectives create a site for presentation of project documentation enable continuous integration and continuous deployment support integration of documentation from other project repositories ensure local development process is streamlined Technologies Used architecture docker github pages github actions mkdocs material static sites for feature rich documentation from markdown git, github: pages and actions for free robust hosting cloudflare to enhance security and edge cache for improved performance and data locality [production env] design for stateless and ephemeral deployments to improve security posture use static site generation to enable effective cache utilization use containers for local development to reduce dependencies volume mounts for mapping local file system to support auto-refresh on save capability docker-compose to streamline on-boarding free hosting that can be used with external domains integrates easily with github actions for CICD experimental repo created to support testing of new capabilities and experimental trials actions created to support CICD process for the site
docs.title: continuous-documentation-delivery

docs.text: Learning Objectives create a site for presentation of project documentation enable continuous integration and continuous deployment support integration of documentation from other project repositories ensure local development process is streamlined Technologies Used architecture docker github pages github actions mkdocs material static sites for feature rich documentation from markdown git, github: pages and actions for free robust hosting cloudflare to enhance security and edge cache for improved performance and data locality [production env] design for stateless and ephemeral deployments to improve security posture use static site generation to enable effective cache utilization use containers for local development to reduce dependencies volume mounts for mapping local file system to support auto-refresh on save capability docker-compose to streamline on-boarding free hosting that can be used with external domains integrates easily with github actions for CICD experimental repo created to support testing of new capabilities and experimental trials actions created to support CICD process for the site
docs.title: continuous-documentation-delivery

docs.text: About ¶ This is an experimental site that uses mkdocs and github actions to perform a continuous deployment strategy for the site. The docker-compose file also enables use of docker to support fast local development and validation of content prior to pushing to github.
docs.title: About
